game.name: Xenomarine
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Experience hardcore, sci-fi dungeon crawling in this dark, atmospheric roguelike. Xenomarine offers tactical turn-based combat with hundreds of unique items and upgradable weapons and armor, as well as massive replayability thanks to its randomly generated content.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience hardcore, sci-fi dungeon crawling in this dark, atmospheric roguelike. Xenomarine offers tactical turn-based combat with hundreds of unique items and upgradable weapons and armor, as well as massive replayability thanks to its randomly generated content.

reviewHighlights.text: 긴장감은 있습니다만 시작하고 나서 보게 되는 컨텐츠의 양적인 면에서 Sword of the Stars : The Pit 에 너무 못미칩니다. 그런데 조작에서 게다리를 중시하는 스타일인 것도 몰입방해(Immersion break) 하는 경향이 있습니다.
